name: Archer Bow Master Hero
description:
If you are looking for shooting games or animal hunting games that includes the arrow hunting too, download for free this archer hunting master game. You will be in the role of a hunter. The arrow game have lots of animals in it for hunting. You will have to survive yourself in this hunter game by killing the other enemy and stay alive.

This ninja hunter game is about hunting, aiming and other contains deadly forest birds. You being the archer will be given the bow in hand and arrows in quiver. Wander around in the forest on horseback. The wild beasts will attack you real bad. Kill yourself or get killed. This game have lots of hunting competitive levels of the game. The game have lots of species in the game as your prey. Game have amazing and very practical and substantial controls. This hunting game have super cool realistic environment of the game. The sport hunting game have supporting sounds for the game.


Following are the features of the game:


1. The game has amazing realistic 2D high graphics environment for forest hunting

2. The game have multiple animals, their physics is awesome

3. You will feel like playing a real horse hunting game with horseback

4. Realistic Animals animations and archery animations

5. Intuitive controls of the game

6. Super cool and competitive levels and missions of the game.

7. Awesome physics and experience of real archery hunting.

8. Use your arrows wisely since they are limited

9. This is time bound game so you have to be quick.
